answers.answer: well some of this sounds like symptoms of diabetes and since your mom has gotten type 2getting checked out probably wouldn't to be to bad of an idea

question: I am 14 years old and recently I have been extremely hungry, it feels like my mouth is very dry, and I have been drinking tons of water. Sometimes when I stand up from sitting I get dizzy. My mom was diagnosed with type 2 diabetes not that long ago. Should I go see a doctor and get checked? What could this possibly be?
title: Help?!?! What could this be?
